abilities.description: The user turns their fist into flames and launches it as a massive column of fire capable of destroying multiple ships in one attack.
The user can create, control, and transform their body into fire at will, making physical attacks pass through them.
The user can propel boats and objects using flames, allowing for rapid movement and navigation.
The user can superheat objects by touching them with their fire-transformed body, such as making a metal sword too hot to hold.

keyMoments.title: Ace Uses Fire Powers Against Smoker
keyMoments.description: Ace demonstrates his Logia-type Devil Fruit abilities while battling Marine Captain Smoker.
keyMoments.significance: Shows a clash between two Logia users (fire vs smoke).

keyMoments.title: Ace Superheats Geronimo's Sword
keyMoments.description: Ace grabs Geronimo's sword with his bare hand and uses his fire powers to superheat the metal blade.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates fine control over the flame powers and their practical combat applications.

keyMoments.title: Hiken Destroys Five Ships
keyMoments.description: Ace launches his signature Hiken attack, destroying five Baroque Works ships consecutively with one massive fire fist.
keyMoments.significance: First full demonstration of Ace's signature technique and the devastating power of the Mera Mera no Mi. This attack earns Ace his epithet 'Fire Fist'.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim and weakness to seawater

reveals.information: Hiken (Fire Fist) technique can destroy multiple ships in one attack
User can superheat objects through contact
User can propel boats and create thrust with flames
